before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"cdhg7","text":"Previous steps:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qikf","text":"This protocol follows the sampling of chunk samples (tooth roots, petrous cores, other bones) and decontamination. Step 2 assumes that the samples have been dried under UV light in the laminar flow hood (see decontamination). Alternatively, the samples can be transferred into tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1mfve","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn0og","text":"Following step:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4921k","text":"This protocol ends with a 72 h incubation step. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b1k43","text":"Clean table bench surface with DNA Exitus and wipe dry. Turn the hood on full power and open the glass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a80dm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cs6al","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a93om","text":"Move dry samples from the hood to the table bench and put down a new sheet of aluminum foil.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"901a8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7upt7","text":"Only applicable if the samples have been dried in the hood previously after decontamination.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"487eo","text":"Clean hood surface with DNA Exitus and put down a new sheet of aluminum foil. Wipe down reagents with DNA Exitus.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ft7u","text":"Place all reagents (except proteinase K) and consumables in the hood and UV while weighing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fae0i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9q3qj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1aa7b","text":"Tare scale with small weighing boat labeled with the sample number, place tooth/petrous core on the weighing boat with the tweezers and record weight. Change gloves when finished with weighing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8or0u","text":"Only applicable if the samples were not placed in tubes after drying and weighed before.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"391bp","text":"Make EDTA   , Proteinase K  , and tube calculations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"48bna","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6k4d8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7meap","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7uip8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"3E6306C0513011ECBD57AFD9C4E0D830","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"50790030513011ECBD57AFD9C4E0D830","id":0,"number":"8.0"}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"18.18","error_concentration":false,"guid":"6675F7D0513011ECBD57AFD9C4E0D830","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"3":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","","","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100,100,100],"data":[["Sample ID","Weight (mg)","EDTA (ml)","PK (µl)","Tube"],["[Sample ID]","x","2 ml per 100 mg (x/50)","50 µl per 100 mg (x/2)","5 ml \u003c 250 mg \u003c 15 ml"],["ABC001A","100","2","50","5"],["ABC001A","300","6","150","15"]],"guid":"C1FAC0104ED111ECAC805F67ADB282A9","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Sample ID","Weight (mg)","EDTA (ml)","PK (µl)","Tube"],["[Sample ID]","x","2 ml per 100 mg (x/50)","50 µl per 100 mg (x/2)","5 ml \u003c 250 mg \u003c 15 ml"],["ABC001A","100","2","50","5"],["ABC001A","300","6","150","15"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ck0v1","text":"Label your tubes for the extractions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fa6dd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"smrv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43gss","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6vnlo","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etcmt","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["","",""],"colWidths":[100,100,100],"data":[["","Top","Side"],["Project ID","PROJ","PROJ"],["Sample ID","ABC001A","ABC001A"],["Extraction #","1","1"],["Initials","","YZ"],["Date","","DD/MM/YYYY"],["Content","P","Pellet"]],"guid":"74FD948B7E0A11ECB36D0A58A9FEAC02","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["","Top","Side"],["Project ID","PROJ","PROJ"],["Sample ID","ABC001A","ABC001A"],["Extraction #","1","1"],["Initials","","YZ"],["Date","","DD/MM/YYYY"],["Content","P","Pellet"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ejt4g","text":"Add calculated amount of EDTA to each tube. If the tubes are empty you can use the same pipette tip as long as you do not get liquid into the filter or touch any surfaces with the tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4l0ge","text":"If necessary: Make Proteinase K solution by adding    PCR clean water to   of powder. Shake to dissolve. Let sit before using. Store in the freezer at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":73,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":151,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2hoa9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5.5","error":false,"guid":"90C1EBC0583D11ECB291E33339BB53D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"A1DB35B0583D11ECB291E33339BB53D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7E281C50583D11ECB291E33339BB53D4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"-20","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1da2j","text":"Add the calculated amount of Proteinase K to each tube and pipette-mix. Change your tips each time.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"avfmo","text":"Add samples to their individual extraction tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9s2n8","text":"Make sure that the lids are tightly sealed to avoid leakage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7nv0k","text":"Wipe tubes with DNA Exitus, wrap tubes with Parafilm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5s5b","text":"Place on the nutating mixer for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b87km","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"62m82","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cav4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qm37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"shaker","mutability":"","data":{"duration":259200,"error_shaker":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C53E10C0512D11ECBD57AFD9C4E0D830","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"shaker":false,"temperature":false},"shaker":"24","start":null,"temperature":"20","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":33}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fi7sj","text":"Continue with the purification protocol after 72 h.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9n1ac","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6itti","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ibg9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tq1q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bb3bi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"eal8f","text":"This protocol assumes that the samples are drying in the hood after decontamination when you start the protocol. Alternatively, if the hood needs to be cleared between decontamination and extraction, dry samples can be stored in tubes.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rsaq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8idfl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dhlp7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"777u5","text":"This protocol is to be followed by the purification protocol after 3 days (72 h). Please plan the purification of the extracts accordingly.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ep3e","text":"Set up decontamination station: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a8jj4","text":"4 disposable 100 ml beakers","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ajb5","text":"6% NaOCl (bleach) aliquot [2x] ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qq9p","text":"MilliQ water [1x]  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14ikk","text":"70% ethanol aliquot [1x]","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ekd6","text":"To decontaminate tweezers, soak in 6% bleach for 5 minutes, rinse with MilliQ water, rinse with 70% Ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"ds0bt","text":"Reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ltps","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vg09","text":"NaOCl (bleach) solution (6%)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9al7","text":"- H290 May be corrosive to metals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"11saj","text":"- H314 Causes severe skin burns and eye damage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"755rf","text":"- H411 Toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ii8k","text":"- EUH206 Warning!
